summary: Led the transition of our platform from an on-premises solution to a hybrid solution leveraging AWS.
Built and deployed various Node.js services to production in AWS using products including ECS, Fargate, Docker, API Gateway, RDS, Lambda and more.
Started building out our first automated testing suite using tools like Mocha, Chai and Cypress.
Built a GraphQL API with Apollo Server, Sequelize, DataLoader and more, and deployed it to our production AWS environment with Fargate (Docker) and API Gateway.
Developed various serverless Node.js apps including APIs, build servers, and more with Lambda, API Gateway, S3/SQS, and more.
Implemented a “temporal” database design, which allowed us to track historical changes of all records over time.
Created a tool that allows users to build custom surveys & send personalized survey invitations using React, Preact, AWS S3 and more.
Improved UX of Razor views in C#/.NET apps.
Improved performance of complex SQL queries for generating reports.
Fixed bugs & added functionality to C#/.NET & Ruby on Rails controllers.
Developed internal web apps for collecting performance review data, as well as a responsive web app for inventorying assets with a mobile device & bluetooth barcode scanner.
Created & Improved SQL queries for ETL processes.
Managed users and their permissions in Active Directory.
Configured routing & subnet settings on routers and switches.
